div.p: MU 94, box 6 (5874/82), Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa Archives, Wellington.

I have to thank you, dear Dr Hector, for sending me such an interesting set of N.Z. plants.
Not identified. Some of them are of particular value in relation to species occurring in the Australian Alps.

After the heavy extra-work for the Exhibition
International Exhibition, Melbourne, 1880-1. I get gradually the departmental arrear-work done, & as my species-Census of Austral. plants will be finished this month, I hope to be able to make up some collections in 1883, when your institution shall not be overlooked.
May be the new year one of happiness to you and your family, that is the wish of
